mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.category_id, p.product_price, p.active, p.position, p.thumb, p.num, p.product_num, m.name as productName, m.desc as description FROM product p LEFT JOIN multilang m ON m.id = CONCAT('p', p.id) AND m.locale= #{locale} WHERE p.category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.active=true Order by p.position
